record.dc:title: 42HS6 Link Site 21HS6, Humphreys County, Tennessee. Burial 23, Constructed with exceptionally large, heavy stone slabs.
record.wpa:narrative: This grave was constructed of exceptionally large heavy limestone slabs. The overall height was 2 feet, the length along the cover slabs 7.1'. The base rested upon the old humus line and the top slabs were .8' from the ground surface. This was a middle tier grave. Thie old humus line is indicated on the profile at each end of grave. Rectangular stone grave with floor, top, ends and sides.
record.wpa:comments: Burial feature form for burial 23 assigned to image 47HS6.
